original_text: Now Jeremiah was free to come and go among the people, for he had not yet been put in prison.
korean_text: 그 때에 예레미야가 갇히지 아니하였으므로 백성 가운데 출입하는 중이었더라

sentences.original_text: to come and go among the people
for he had not yet been put in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아직 감옥에 갇히지 않았기 때문이다
